views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  emptyGridMessage: "No vendors available",
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.isActive,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_isActive(
        isActive: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.isActive]
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      width: "ICON"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Name",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.legalName,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_vendorName(
        recordTitle: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.legalName],
        recordIdentifier: fv!identifier
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "UEI",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId,
      helpTooltip: "Unique Entity Identifier",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "DUNS",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.duns,
      helpTooltip:
      "Data Universal Numbering System",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.duns]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.duns]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "CAGE",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode,
      helpTooltip:
      "Commercial and Government Entity Code",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode]
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.status,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.status],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Business Type",
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_businessType(
        businessType: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.businessType],
        businessTypeRecord: {}
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Address",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
          ),
          "-",
          rule!AS_GAM_UT_displayAddressAsEnvelope(
            addressLine1: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
            addressLine2: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
            state: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorState.stateName],
            city: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCity],
            zipCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorZipCode],
            zipCodeExt: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
            foreignPostalCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
            country: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCountry.countryName],
            countryId: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCountry.countryId]
          )
        )
      ),
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Expiration Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.expirationDate,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.expirationDate],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    )
  },
  pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE,
  initialSorts: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.legalName,
      ascending: true
    )
  },
  spacing: "STANDARD",
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: true,
  rowHeader: null
)

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CO_CRD_readOnlyIconTitleAndLabel
interfaces.description: Provides a cardLayout, with the following centered: icon, title, and description

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CO_SBS_stampTitleAndLabel
interfaces.description: A side by side layout that contains a stampField with a richTextDisplayField

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextListWithShowMoreLess
interfaces.description: Generic interface for displaying rich text display components fields

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!itemsToDisplay: a!refreshVariable(
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!items,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!shortenIfLongerThanCount),
        ri!shortenIfLongerThanCount = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: rule!AS_GSS_UT_showMoreOrShowLessList(
        item: ri!items,
        shortenIfLongerThanCount: ri!shortenIfLongerThanCount,
        includeLineBreak: if(
          ri!showBulletedList,
          ri!includeLineBreak,
          false
        ),
        i18nData: ri!i18nData
      )
    ),
    refreshAlways: true
  ),
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: ri!label,
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: if(
      ri!showBulletedList,
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextBulletedList"(items: local!itemsToDisplay),
      local!itemsToDisplay
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
    accessibilityText: if(
      count(ri!items) > ri!shortenIfLongerThanCount,
      "Clicking more will add additional content behind your current location",
      null
    )
  )
)

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_FM_vendorDetailsSummary
interfaces.description: Vendor details summary for the vendor Record

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_vendorDetailsSectionForVendorSummary
interfaces.description: Vendor details section for vendor details summary

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"(
  label: "",
  contents: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_cardLayout"(
      contents: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
          value: {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: "VENDOR DETAILS",
              color: "ACCENT",
              style: { "STRONG" }
            )
          }
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_CO_SBS_stampTitleAndLabel(
          stampIcon: "map-pin",
          value: if(
            any(
              rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank,
              {
                ri!vendor.vendorAddressLine1,
                ri!vendor.vendorCountry
              }
            ),
            "-",
            rule!AS_GAM_UT_displayAddressAsEnvelope(
              addressLine1: ri!vendor.vendorAddressLine1,
              addressLine2: ri!vendor.vendorAddressLine2,
              state: ri!vendor.vendorState.stateName,
              city: ri!vendor.vendorCity,
              zipCode: ri!vendor.vendorZipCode,
              zipCodeExt: ri!vendor.vendorZipCodeExt,
              foreignPostalCode: ri!vendor.vendorForeignPostalCode,
              country: ri!vendor.vendorCountry.countryName,
              countryId: ri!vendor.vendorCountry.countryId
            )
          ),
          label: "ADDRESS"
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_CO_SBS_stampTitleAndLabel(
          stampIcon: "hashtag",
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!vendor.uniqueEntityId,
            replacementValue: "-"
          ),
          label: "UEI",
          showWhen: not(ri!isStateOrLocal)
        ),

        rule!AS_GSS_CO_SBS_stampTitleAndLabel(
          stampIcon: "hashtag",
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!vendor.cageCode,
            replacementValue: "-"
          ),
          label: "CAGE",
          showWhen: not(ri!isStateOrLocal)
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_CO_SBS_stampTitleAndLabel(
          stampIcon: "hashtag",
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!vendor.tin,
            replacementValue: "-"
          ),
          label: "TIN",
          showWhen: ri!isStateOrLocal
        ),
        rule!AS_GSS_CO_SBS_stampTitleAndLabel(
          stampIcon: "hashtag",
          value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
            nullableValue: ri!vendor.fein,
            replacementValue: "-"
          ),
          label: "FEIN",
          showWhen: ri!isStateOrLocal
        )
      },
      height: "AUTO",
      style: "NONE",
      marginBelow: "NONE",
      showBorder: false
    )
  },
  divider: "NONE"
)

test_inputs.input_value:
'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Vendor'(
  vendorAddressLine1: "123 Street",
  vendorAddressLine2: "Apt 2",
  vendorState: {stateName: "Virginia"},
  vendorCity: "Tysons",
  vendorZipCode: "12345",
  vendorCountry: {countryId: cons!AS_GAM_REF_ID_COUNTRY_UNITED_STATES, countryName: "United state"}
)

interfaces.name: AS_GSS_vendorStatusCardsForVendorSummary
interfaces.description: Vendor status cards for the vendor details summary page

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_vendorName
expression_rules.description: Grid column for "Vendor Name" in vendor record

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField
expression_rules.description: Filters a CDT by a matching a single value or list of values in a single field, if a list is passed, all matches are returned

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
expression_rules.description: Pass in a field (i.e. member[1].name) and this will index(index(index( for each field

data.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)
data.definition:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity
expression_rules.description: Helper rule to execute queries with minimal overhead, pass `returnType` based on the query purpose

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_replaceNull
expression_rules.description: Returns nullableValue only if it is not null. Else returns replacementValue.

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_isBlank
expression_rules.description: Evaluates if the provided value is empty/blank. Returns True or False.

data.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0
)

test_cases.test_name: Array cast to Any Type with first value null

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_DSP_primaryRecordListField
expression_rules.description: Standard display for a primary record-list field, uses a larger size and strong rich text

data.sail_code:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
  text: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: ri!icon), " " },
      showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!icon)
    ),
    ri!recordTitle
  },
  link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
    label: ri!recordTitle,
    recordtype: ri!recordType,
    identifier: ri!recordIdentifier
  ),
  linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
  size: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!size,
    replacementValue: "STANDARD"
  ),
  style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!style,
    replacementValue: "STRONG"
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen
)
data.definition:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
  text: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
      text: { #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(icon: ri!icon), " " },
      showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!icon)
    ),
    ri!recordTitle
  },
  link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
    label: ri!recordTitle,
    recordtype: ri!recordType,
    identifier: ri!recordIdentifier
  ),
  linkStyle: "STANDALONE",
  size: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!size,
    replacementValue: "STANDARD"
  ),
  style: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!style,
    replacementValue: "STRONG"
  ),
  showWhen: ri!showWhen
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_UT_displayAddressAsEnvelope

expression_rules.description: Returns a GSS branding value by key

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_businessType
expression_rules.description: Grid column for "Business Type" in the vendor record

data.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!businessTypeName: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!businessType.typeCode.description,
      replacementValue: ri!businessTypeRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.refBusinessTypes.description]
    ),
    expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: fv!item,
      replacementValue: "-"
    ) & char(10)
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_richTextListWithShowMoreLess(
    items: local!businessTypeName,
    shortenIfLongerThanCount: cons!AS_GAM_INT_LIMIT_FOR_SHOW_MORE_OR_LESS_MEDIUM,
    includeLineBreak: false(),
    showBulletedList: false(),
    i18nData: local!i18nData
  )
)
data.definition:
a!localVariables(
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!businessTypeName: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: ri!businessType.typeCode.description,
      replacementValue: ri!businessTypeRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.refBusinessTypes.description]
    ),
    expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: fv!item,
      replacementValue: "-"
    ) & char(10)
  ),
  rule!AS_GSS_CPS_richTextListWithShowMoreLess(
    items: local!businessTypeName,
    shortenIfLongerThanCount: cons!AS_GAM_INT_LIMIT_FOR_SHOW_MORE_OR_LESS_MEDIUM,
    includeLineBreak: false(),
    showBulletedList: false(),
    i18nData: local!i18nData
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder
expression_rules.description: Loads a property bundle file by name from a folder, returns a dictionary of the key-value pairs

test_cases.test_name: EXCEPTION: It is not possible to have a test case with assertion for this rule

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_isActive
expression_rules.description: Grid column for "isActive" in the vendor record

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_QE_getRefVendorDetails
expression_rules.description: Returns ref vendor details based on the filter set applied

data.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_R_VENDOR,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Vendor',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorRefId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!vendorRefId
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: "vendorRefId",
    ascending: true
  )
)
data.definition:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_R_VENDOR,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Vendor',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorRefId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!vendorRefId
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
    field: "vendorRefId",
    ascending: true
  )
)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_not
expression_rules.description: Null handles for not -- null returns true (null acts like false)

expression_rules.name: AS_CO_UT_formatDate
expression_rules.description: Formats a date for read-only text display. Note, do not use this rule to format date times, only dates. Returns text.

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_EnableOrDisableStateAndLocalGovernment_wrapper
expression_rules.description: This rule returns a boolean which represents whether or not State and Local is enabled

expression_rules.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
expression_rules.description: Displays a label by the `bundleKey` from passed in bundle data, optionally accepts arguments

expression_rules.name: AS_GSS_UT_showMoreOrShowLessList
expression_rules.description: Displays expandable / shortened for list of text -As  ...show more/ less

data.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
  not(rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!input))
)

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY
constants.description: OBJECT_ARRAY - Returns an array type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT
constants.description: SINGLE_OBJECT - Returns a single type of the CDT when passed to rule `AS_CO_UT_queryEntity`

constants.name: AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE
constants.description: 25 - MEDIUM_LARGE page size, used for grids and other paging situations

record_types.name: AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD
record_types.description: DEPRECATED IN GSS 2.5 - Synced record for Ref Vendor Business Types (Only used in vendor migration process)

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Business Ref Type Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId,
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
            text: if(
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId] < 100000,
              text(
                fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId],
                "#00000"
              ),
              fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.businessRefTypeId]
            ),
            link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordLink"(
              recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD,
              identifier: fv!identifier
            ),
            linkStyle: "STANDALONE"
          )
        }
      )
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Vendor Ref Id",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId], "â"),
      align: "END"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Type Code",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.typeCode], "â")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy], "â")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Created Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime]),
        "â",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified By",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      value: a!defaultValue(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy], "â")
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Modified Datetime",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime]),
        "â",
        datetext(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime], "default")
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Is Active",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      value: if(
        isnull(fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive]),
        "â",
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          value: if(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Ref_VendorBusinessType_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive],
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "check",
              altText: "Yes",
              color: "#138901"
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextIcon"(
              icon: "times",
              altText: "No",
              color: "SECONDARY"
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      align: "CENTER"
    )
  },
  pageSize: 50,
  shadeAlternateRows: true
)

record_types.name: AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD
record_types.description: DEPRECATED IN GSS 2.5 - Record for vendors

views.ui_expr:
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_recordGridField"(
  emptyGridMessage: "No vendors available",
  columns: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.isActive,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_isActive(
        isActive: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.isActive]
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      width: "ICON"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "Name",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.legalName,
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_vendorName(
        recordTitle: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.legalName],
        recordIdentifier: fv!identifier
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "UEI",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId,
      helpTooltip: "Unique Entity Identifier",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.uniqueEntityId]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label: "DUNS",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.duns,
      helpTooltip:
      "Data Universal Numbering System",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.duns]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.duns]
      ),
      width: "AUTO"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "CAGE",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode,
      helpTooltip:
      "Commercial and Government Entity Code",
      value: if(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
          fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode]
        ),
        "-",
        fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.cageCode]
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Status",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.status,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.status],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      width: "NARROW"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Business Type",
      value: rule!AS_GSS_UT_recordGridColumn_businessType(
        businessType: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.businessType],
        businessTypeRecord: {}
      ),
      width: "MEDIUM_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Address",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
        value: if(
          rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(
            fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine1]
          ),
          "-",
          rule!AS_GAM_UT_displayAddressAsEnvelope(
            addressLine1: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine1],
            addressLine2: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorAddressLine2],
            state: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorState.stateName],
            city: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCity],
            zipCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorZipCode],
            zipCodeExt: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorZipCodeExt],
            foreignPostalCode: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorForeignPostalCode],
            country: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCountry.countryName],
            countryId: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.vendorCountry.countryId]
          )
        )
      ),
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_gridColumn"(
      label:
      "Expiration Date",
      sortField: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.expirationDate,
      value: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
        nullableValue: fv!row[recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.expirationDate],
        replacementValue: "-"
      ),
      align: "END",
      width: "NARROW_PLUS"
    )
  },
  pageSize: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_PAGE_SIZE_MEDIUM_LARGE,
  initialSorts: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Vendor_RECORD.legalName,
      ascending: true
    )
  },
  spacing: "STANDARD",
  borderStyle: "LIGHT",
  shadeAlternateRows: true,
  rowHeader: null
)
